snippet: LEAD: Picture Vice President Bush campaigning in California later this year. Silent, well-dressed witnesses carrying placards move to the front of the crowd at every stop. They carry silhouettes shaped like offshore oil platforms and long-armed ca...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Picture Vice President Bush campaigning in California later this year. Silent, well-dressed witnesses carrying placards move to the front of the crowd at every stop. They carry silhouettes shaped like offshore oil platforms and long-armed cactuses. These images, and Dukakis television spots reinforcing them, reach millions of television viewers, reminding them that Mr.

byline.original: By Paul J. Growald; Paul J. Growald is a cable television executive who serves as northern California vice president of the California League of Conservation Voters
